item.title: Game of Life | A Digital Universe
item.description: How four tiny rules create a digital universe of life, logic, and surprising complexity.

item.title: DIY Home Project #472: Bubble-wrap the Sun with a Dyson Sphere
item.description: A fun dive into Dyson spheres, megastructures, solar swarms, and what it would take to bubble-wrap the Sun for unlimited power.
